ðŸ“– Summary: AFFiNE is an open-source workspace that merges documents, whiteboards, and databases into a single, unified canvas. It offers local-first data storage, real-time collaboration, and AI-powered assistance for various tasks. It aims to provide a more flexible and integrated alternative to tools like Notion and Miro.
